snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel v1.1 (ALTTP Hack) Walkthrough
snippet.description:
A complete video walkthrough with a 100% item collection for version 1.1 of The Legend of Zelda: Parallel Remodel. Played in real time on Snes9x 1.55 with re-records used to optimize video length.

Parallel Remodel is a dumbed-down fork of Parallel Worlds, which is an extremely difficult game. Parallel Worlds has excellent overworlds and caves, but the dungeons are rife with extreme backtracking, bomb jumping, repetitive mini-bosses, enemies that are too powerful, etc. This fork of Parallel Worlds, released by PuzzleDude in 2012, attempts to address the biggest pitfalls of the original Parallel Worlds, but still falls short. The final result is that the new Parallel Remodel dungeons ended up being too linear, and the difficulty is inconsistent now. For example, Mothula is still the first boss of Nayru's Bay. The Cane of Byrna is still required in Farore's Isle and Nabooru's Hole. The Icy World dungeon order was changed. You only have to climb the Parallel Tower once, in the Icy World.

Download links:
PR v1.1: https://mega.nz/file/VmBUgYJQ#psT5_Qz7zBRLI7oKyHnV9FfkFXzrDkWsHtp_qyfXOiw
PR v1.1 (with MSU-1): https://mega.nz/file/Q6IUUKSL#UhgF-2R15EhL1dvlwOb3wjRDm0rIjvU4ekXKGkxvfno
MSU-1 Getting Started: https://www.zeldix.net/t1607-msu1-getting-started-guide
MSU-1 Patch and Audio Files: https://www.zeldix.net/t791-the-legend-of-zelda-a-link-to-the-past
UPS Patcher: https://mega.nz/file/w3BAFS7B#T1AEFUcJgp_rq5jeej-laObhhWT4S15iNFxZM3dXXMo
SNES Rom Utility: https://www.romhacking.net/download/utilities/593/

Note: You must use a US rom with no header. You need a UPS patcher. If your rom is headered, you will also need to download a special utility to remove the header (e.g. SNES Rom Utility).
File Name: Legend of Zelda, The: A Link to the Past [U] [!]
File Size: 1.024 KB (1,048,576 bytes)
Checksum: CRC32 777AAC2F

 Guardhouse & Sewers
 Collection 
 Pendant 1: Nayru's Bay (Mothula)
 Pendant 2: Din's Catacombs (Moldorm)
 2nd Collection
 {"Pendant 3"}: Farore's Isle (Helmasaur King)
 Tempered Sword 
 Hyrule Castle (Draegor)
 Level 4: Darinia's Cavern (Vitreous)
 Level 7: Impa's Ways (Moldorm)
 3rd Collection
 Level 3: Nabooru's Hole (Helmasaur King)
 Level 6: Sheik's Hideout (Vitreous, Mothula)
 Level 5: Saria's Gardens (Blind)
 Level 1: Rauru's Ruins (Arrghus)
 Level 2: Ruto's Fortress (Kholdstare, Mothula)
 Level 8: Parallel Tower [Icy World]
 Final Collection
 FINAL BOSS: Ganon
 Ending & Credits
